**Mutual Information Formula:**

MI(Rain; Umbrella) = H(Rain) + H(Umbrella) - H(Rain, Umbrella)

Where:

* H(Rain) is the entropy of the Rain variable (uncertainty or randomness)
* H(Umbrella) is the entropy of the Umbrella variable 
* H(Rain, Umbrella) is the joint entropy of both variables (total uncertainty)
